typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'sourcefilename',
	wildcardPaths:['output/Data/CSV/*.csv']) ~> GeoData
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1, GeoData union(byName: false)~> Union1
GeoData sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
